Detailed Description

HTTP response data structure.

Response frome remote host. 

 responser.readData(&data, &len);
 fprintf(stdout, "Length: %d\n", len);

virtual gaia::base::Array<gaia::base::String>* gaia::net::HttpResponse::getHeader ( const gaia::base::String &  key) const [pure virtual]

Get coresponding values of given key from response header.

Parameters:
keyKey of the field to be get.
Returns:
A list of value, or NULL if header is not present. Caller should delete the returning instance.

virtual RESULT gaia::net::HttpResponse::readResponse ( gaia::base::ByteArray *  data,
size_t *  readLength 
) [pure virtual]

Read response from remote host.

If remote host haven't ready yet, this function blocks until it ready.

Parameters:
dataData buffer for returning data.
readLengthreturn that length of data which actually read.
Returns:
An error code. NET_EOF returned if end of response is reached.
